solution_line_template: If the number of nephews Alden had {alden_nephews_past} years ago is half the number of nephews he has now, Alden has {alden_nephews_past}*{multiplier_for_half} = <<{alden_nephews_past}*{multiplier_for_half}={alden_nephews_now}>>{alden_nephews_now} nephews.

Vihaan has {vihaan_more_than_alden} more nephews than Alden, meaning currently Vihaan has {alden_nephews_now}+{vihaan_more_than_alden} = <<{alden_nephews_now}+{vihaan_more_than_alden}={vihaan_nephews_now}>>{vihaan_nephews_now} nephews.
